text:
@realDonaldTrump @FoxNews Now for a NOT SO AMAZING COVID-19 REPORT.
Numbers still climbing, large number of people are still dying. No word from the WH on this.
Last updated on June 4, 2020
Total Cases 1,842,101  -  14,676 New Cases*
Total Deaths 107,029   -  827 New Deaths*
*Compared to yesterday's data
